channel.title: workers on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in workers on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-24
item.description: Huawei enters China’s electric car race in competition with Tesla (3 minute read) Huawei recently released details on a vehicle with specs it claims beats Tesla’s Model Y.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-16
item.description: Excerpt: How Google bought Android—according to folks in the room (12 minute read) A new book from a long-time Android engineer offers a behind-the-scenes look at early Android development.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-28
item.description: Amazon Introduces Tiny ‘ZenBooths’ for Stressed Out Warehouse Workers (3 minute read) Amazon is introducing tiny booths for its workers to momentarily escape from their jobs.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-05
item.description: Google Workers Publicly Launch Union (4 minute read) Google workers have publicly launched a unionization effort.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-27
item.description: Salesforce is in talks to buy Slack, deal could be announced next week (2 minute read) Slack shares closed almost 38% higher on Wednesday after it was reported that Salesforce was in talks to acquire the company.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-01
item.description: Nearby Sharing — Android’s AirDrop competitor — is rolling out now in beta (5 minute read) A beta test for Android’s Nearby Sharing feature is rolling out via the Play Services beta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-06-30
item.description: Uber reportedly looking to buy Postmates delivery service (1 minute read) Uber has made an offer to purchase Postmates.
